name: spas-flickr
readme:
# spas-flickr

Flickr API helpers for SPAS

## Installation

### Installing little-spas
``` bash
$ [sudo] npm install little-spas -g
```

### Installing spas-flickr
``` bash
$ [sudo] npm install spas-flickr
```

## Documentation spas-flickr documentation can be found at http://dtex.github.com/spas-flickr
